identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), Hero text, Big stats

colors.description: A professional, high-trust slate foundation with organic accents for human warmth.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-2 or p-4 for main containers.

admin_dashboard.name: The Control Room
admin_dashboard.rules: Dense, data-heavy. Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms.

employee_dashboard.name: The Tetris Grid
employee_dashboard.rules: Asymmetric. Mix hero cards (col-span-8) with quick actions (col-span-4).

inputs.style: rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 border border-white/20 shadow-sm
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in card backgrounds only.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-color. Use border-r or border-b for grid separation.

general: Do not use Inter for headings.
Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, active, focus).
testing: All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA.
Do not rely on color alone for status.
file_types: Use .jsx or .js for React components (project uses JS).

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building Dayflow, a professional HRMS. Follow the Organic Swiss design system. Use the provided image URLs for the login page and dashboard placeholders. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the Admin Dashboard and 'Tetris' grid for the Employee Dashboard. Ensure all components are accessible and have data-testid attributes.
